message: 我寫了一篇文章，用QA的方式快速解釋為什麼這次強迫闖關是一個憲政危機，尤其因為四不像的體制造成可以這樣蠻幹的因素。我想對於向外解釋是很實用的。我還會繼續往下寫第二篇，關於學生到底做了什麼，第三篇到底這個協議的問題等。
story: Ian Chen shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: The students occupied the Parliament rather than a movie theater. What was wrong about the legislative branch?In very short words, a 30-second legislative progress.Indeed an example of efficiency. ...
name: Start with A Very Twisted System
caption: thenightbefore319.wordpress.com
